page.title: 18Northill Recreation & Events
page.content: Every organisation has a{Jumble Sale} occasionally, the easiest & surest way of generating funds, and these events are always well attended and enjoyed. {Outdoor hobbies}include gardening, shooting, riding, fishing and running which are all pursued with enthusiasm. The popular{fete}held in St. John's grounds is now an annual event, as is a{ten-mile mini-marathon}in aid of both Park Hospital and St. John's. {Typical monthly events}in this active and friendly village might include:- Plant & Produce{Sale}+ Fashion{Show}+} N'Amblers{Walk}+ Parish{Supper}+ Local Photos.{competition}at the Tea Room + Drama Group{entertainment & supper}+ a Cake & Produce{Stall}for Church Funds +{Presentation}to 2 retired School Dinner Ladies for 16 and 22 years ser- vice{+ Sherry evening}in aid of St. John's{+}Social Circle Autumn{Dance.
